description: BBC News NI's Shane Harrison looks at the fallout as Ireland's president signs it a new bill into law.
title: Mother and baby homes controversy 'has not gone away'
title_page: Mother and baby homes controversy 'has not gone away' - BBC News
maintext: But campaigners and some of those seeking more information about their own life story, including their natural mother and their adoption, believe that sealing the records will deny them an opportunity to find out more about themselves and their history.
